title: Hour 1 - Robert Sarver May Lose Suns, Aaron Judge Chasing HR Record
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Robert Sarver May Lose Suns, Aaron Judge Chasing HR Record
description:
Dan addresses the racism and misogyny alleged against Pheonix Suns Owner, Robert Sarver and what the appropriate punishment should be. And he talks about the amazing Aaron Judge and watching the Yankees slugger chase history.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
